outcome.success: New e-service version published successfully

confirmDialog.title: Confirm Draft Publication
confirmDialog.description: An e-service version cannot be deleted after it is published. It will also become available in the e-service catalog. It will always be possible to suspend it or mark it as deprecated when a new version is published

publishDelegatedVersionDraft.loading: Version is being forwarded to the delegator

outcome.success: New e-service version was forwarded to the delegator for publication approval

confirmDialog.description: You are about to forward to {{delegatorName}} the request to publish a new version of the {{eserviceName}} e-service.

submitDraft.loading: Fruition request is being forwarded to the Producer

outcome.success: Request forwarded successfully and awaiting approval by the **Producer**
outcome.error: The request could not be forwarded. If you believe you are entitled, please contact support for further checks

description.default: By clicking "confirm", the fruition request will be forwarded to the e-service producer for approval
description.isDelegated: By clicking "confirm", the fruition request will be forwarded to the e-service producer for approval and a notification will be sent to the delegating party for information.

outcome.success: The fruition request has been activated successfully
outcome.error: The request could not be activated. Please try again

confirmDialog.title: Confirm Fruition Request Activation
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the fruition request will be activated. Your party is the e-service's producer, so no attribute verification or approval is required

confirmDialog.title: Confirm Request Archiving
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the fruition request will be archived. This action is irreversible. Clients linked to this request will no longer have access to the producing e-service. New service requests can always be created for this e-service
